contactFormDialog.title: Build Your Plan
contactFormDialog.description: To get started in improving your company culture, please fill in the form below and you will be contacted.

featureMegaMenu.heading: Explore the full power of rewards
featureMegaMenu.text: See how our complete suite of recognition tools helps you motivate, reward, and celebrate your team effortlessly.

item1.title: Automated Rewards
item1.description: For your every employee, an automated incentive journey to awaken the winner in everyone of them.

item2.title: Gifts
item2.description: We curate rewards for your team based on goal completion for your company.

item3.title: Trips
item3.description: Set up milestone-based team or solo trips as high-impact rewards for top performers.

item4.title: Award Ceremony
item4.description: Create memorable recognition moments with digital or in-person award ceremonies.

item1.title: Why Us
item1.description: Built to make motivation measurable, rewards meaningful, and teams unstoppable.

item2.title: Careers
item2.description: Join a team that celebrates progress—yours included.

item3.title: News
item3.description: The latest on how we're shaping the future of rewards and recognition.

item4.title: Customers
item4.description: How leading teams are turning goals into momentum and recognition into results.
